name: Blood of your Blood
description:
Our protagonist wakes up one day totally alone at home, but while walking he will notice strange events, it will be up to you to find out why.

The game will be based on the completion of puzzles and... optional general knowledge quizzes

Full screen use is highly recommended for a better gaming experience

To put the game in fullscreen use the blue button located at the bottom right of the game

Done in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
